Verses: 1 esekkiyaa Irubaththaindhaam Vayadhil Raajaavaagi, Irubaththonbadhu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan; Sagariyaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Avanudaiya Thaayinper Abiyaal.
2 avan Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Seydhapadiyellaam Karththarin Paarvaikku Semmaiyaanadhai Seydhaan.
3 avan Than Raajyabaaraththin Mudhalaam Varusham Mudhalaam Maadhaththil Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Kadhavugalaith Thirandhu, Avaigalaip Pazhudhupaarththu,
4 aasaariyaraiyum Leviyaraiyum Azhaiththuvandhu, Avargalaik Kizhakku Veedhiyile Koodivarachcheydhu,

5 avargalai Nokki: Leviyare, Kelungal; Neengal Ippodhu Ungalaipparisuththam Pannikkondu, Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiyaaalayaththaip Parisuththampanni Asuththamaanadhaip Parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Veliye Kondupongal.

6 nammudaiya Pidhaakkal Dhrogampanni, Nammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Avarai Vittu Vilagi, Thangal Mugangalaik Karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththai Vittuth Thiruppi, Adharku Mudhugaik Kaattinaargal.
7 avargal Parisuththa Sthalaththil Isravelin Dhevanukku Sarvaanga Thaganapali Seluththaamalum, Thoobankaattaamalum, Vilakkugalai Anaiththuppottu, Mandabaththin Kadhavugalaiyum Poottippottaargal.
8 aagaiyaal Karththarudaiya Kadunkobam Yoodhaavinmelum Erusaleminmelum Vandhu, Avar Ivargalai, Neengal Ungal Kangalinaal Kaangirapadi, Thuyaraththukkum Thigaippukkum Pazhippukkum Oppukkoduththaar.
9 idho, Idhinimiththam Nammudaiya Pidhaakkal Pattayaththinaal Vizhundhu, Nammudaiya Kumaararum Nammudaiya Kumaaraththigalum Nammudaiya Manaivigalum Siraiyiruppil Agappattaargal.
10 ippodhum Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Ukkirakobam Nammaivittuth Thirumbumpadikku, Avarode Udanpadikkaipanna Manadhile Nirnayiththukkonden.

11 en Kumaarare, Ippozhudhu Asadhiyaayiraadheyungal; Neengal Karththarukkup Panividai Seyyumpadi Avarukku Munbaaga Nirkavum, Avarukku Oozhiyancheygiravargalum Thoobankaattugiravargalumaayirukkavum Ungalai Avar Therindhukondaar Endraan.

12 appozhudhu Kogaadh Puththiraril Amaasaayin Kumaaran Maagaaththum, Asariyaavin Kumaaran Yovelum, Meraariyin Puththiraril Apthiyin Kumaaran Keesum, Egalelin Kumaaran Asariyaavum, Kersoniyaril Simmaavin Kumaaran Yovaagum, Yovaagin Kumaaran Edhenum,
13 elichchaappaan Puththiraril Simriyum, Eyelum, Aasaappin Puththiraril Sagariyaavum, Maththaniyaavum,
14 emaanin Puththiraril Egiyelum, Simeyiyum, Edhuththoonin Puththiraril Semaayaavum, Oosiyelum Ennum Leviyar Ezhumbi,
15 thangal Sagodhararaik Koodivarachcheydhu, Parisuththampannikkondu, Karththarudaiya Vasanangalukkoththa Raajaavinudaiya Karpanaiyinpadiye Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Suththigarikka Vandhaargal.

16 aasaariyargal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Suththigarikkumpadi Utpuraththile Pravesiththu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththil Kanda Sagala Asuththaththaiyum Veliyekarththarudaiya Aalayappraagaaraththil Konduvandhaargal; Appozhudhu Leviyar Adhai Eduththu, Veliye Keedharon Aatrirkuk Konduponaargal.

17 mudhal Maadham Mudhal Thedhiyile Avargal Parisuththampannaththuvakki, Ettaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Mandabaththile Pravesiththu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Ettunaalil Parisuththampanni, Mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaaraam Thedhiyil Adhai Mudiththaargal.

18 avargal Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaavinidaththil Poi: Naangal Karththarin Aalayaththaiyum, Sarvaanga Thaganapalipeedaththaiyum, Adhinudaiya Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Samugaththappangalin Mejaiyaiyum, Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Suththigariththu,

19 raajaavaagiya Aagaas Arasaalumpodhu Thammudaiya Paadhagaththinaal Erindhupotta Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum Musthippaakkip Parisuththampanninom; Idho, Avaigal Karththarin Aalayaththirku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu Endraargal.
20 appozhudhu Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Kaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Nagaraththin Prabukkalaik Koottikkondu, Karththarin Aalayaththirkup Ponaan.

21 appozhudhu Raajyabaaraththirkaagavum Parisuththa Sthalaththirkaagavum Yoodhaavukkaagavum Ezhu Kaalaigalaiyum, Ezhu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Ezhu Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Ezhu Vellaattukkadaakkalaiyum, Paavanivaaranapaliyaagak Konduvandhaargal; Avaigalaik Karththarudaiya Palipeedaththinmel Paliyidungal Endru Avan Aasaariyaraagiya Aaronin Puththirarukku Sonnaan.

22 appadiye Aasaariyar Kaalaigalai Adiththu, Andha Raththaththaip Pidiththup Palipeedaththinmel Theliththaargal; Aattukkadaakkalai Adiththu, Avaigalin Raththaththaip Palipeedaththinmel Theliththaargal; Aattukkuttigalaiyum Adiththu, Avaigalin Raththaththaiyum Palipeedaththinmel Theliththaargal.
23 pirpaadu Paavanivaarana Palikkaana Vellaattukkadaakkalai Raajaavukkum Sabaiyaarukku Munbaagak Konduvandhaargal; Avaigalmel Avargal Thangal Kaigalai Vaiththaargal.

24 isravel Anaiththirkaagavum, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Paavanivaarana Paliyaiyum Seluththungal Endru Raajaa Solliyirundhaan; Aadhalaal Aasaariyar Avaigalai Adiththu, Isravel Anaiththirkum Paavanivirththi Undaakka, Avaigalin Raththaththaal Palipeedaththinmel Praayachchiththancheydhaargal.

25 avan, Dhaaveedhum, Raajaavin Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Kaaththum, Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanum Karpiththapadiye, Kaiththaalangalaiyum Thamburugalaiyum Suramandalangalaiyum Vaasikkira Leviyaraik Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Niruththinaan; Ippadi Seyyavendum Engira Karpanai Karththaraal Avarudaiya Theerkkadharisigalaik Kondu Undaayirundhadhu.
26 appadiye Leviyar Dhaaveedhin Keedhavaaththiyangalaiyum, Aasaariyar Poorigaigalaiyum Pidiththu Nindraargal.

27 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaip Palipeedaththinmel Seluththak Kattalaiyittaan; Avan Adhai Seluththath Thuvakkina Neraththil Karththaraith Thudhikkum Keedhamum Poorigaigalum, Isravel Raajaavaagiya Dhaaveedhu Erpaduththina Keedhavaaththiyangalum Muzhangaththodanginadhu.
28 keedhaththaippaadi, Poorigaigalai Oodhikkondirukkaiyil, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyai Seluththith Theerumattum Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Panindhukondirundhaargal.
29 paliyittuth Theerndhapodhu, Raajaavum Avanodirundha Anaivarum Thalaigunindhu Panindhukondaargal.

30 pinbu Esekkiyaa Raajaavum Prabukkalum Leviyarai Nokki: Neengal Dhaaveedhum Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Aasaabum Paadina Vaarththaigalinaal Karththaraith Thudhiyungal Endraargal; Appozhudhu Magizhchchiyode Thudhiseydhu Thalaigunindhu Panindhukondaargal.

31 adhinpinbu Esekkiyaa: Ippodhum Neengal Karththarukkendru Ungalaip Parisuththampannineergal; Aagaiyaal Kittavandhu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththirkuth Thaganapaligalaiyum Sthoththirapaligalaiyum Konduvaarungal Endraan; Appozhudhu Sabaiyaar Thaganapaligalaiyum Sthoththirapaligalaiyum, Ishtamullavargalellaam Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Konduvandhaargal.
32 sabaiyaar Konduvandha Sarvaangadhaganapaligalin Thogai Ezhubadhu Kaalaigalum, Nooru Aattukkadaakkalum, Irunooru Aattukkuttigalume; Ivaigalellaamkarththarukku Sarvaanga Thaganamaayina.
33 arunooru Kaalaigalum Moovaayiram Aadugalum Pradhishtaiyaakkappattadhu.

34 aanaalum Aasaariyargal Konjam Peraanadhinaal Avargalaal Andha Sarvaanga Thaganamaana Jeevangalaiyellaam Adiththuth Tholurikka Mudiyaadhirundhadhu; Adhinaale Andha Velai Theerumattaagavum, Matra Aasaariyar Thangalaip Parisuththampannumattaagavum, Avargal Sagodhararaagiya Leviyar Avargalukku Udhaviseydhaargal; Thangalaip Parisuththampannikkolla Leviyar Aasaariyaraippaarkkilum Mana Urchaagamullavargalaayirundhaargal.

35 sarvaanga Thaganapaligalum, Sthoththirapaligalin Kozhuppum, Sarvaanga Thaganangalukkaduththa Paanapaligalum Migudhiyaayirundhadhu; Ivvidhamaai Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Aaraadhanai Thittampannappattadhu.
36 dhevan Janaththai Aayaththappaduththinadhaikkuriththu Esekkiyaavum Janangal Ellaarum Sandhoshappattaargal; Indhak Kaariyaththai Seyyumpadiyaana Yosanai Sadudhiyaai Undaayitru.
